}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The text on the bottom of one unit (the one populating this entry) reads... *'''NetLINE PN796''' *''USB 10/100 Ethernet Adapter'' *<barcode> *0044A4007777 *Made in Taiwan *8970895-00-02 CA440
Additional text (at least "3704-", "9861002") is also silkscreened under the Ethernet port. :"REV.A1-13" is silkscreened on the (visible) board. The Windows device description in the manual is '''Farallon NetLINE USB 10/100 Ethernet Adapter'''
:There may be multiple revisions of this device (''Farallon Communications''). The [http://www.driverguide.com/driver/detail.php?driverid=114541 796v20.zip] driver set includes [http://contents.driverguide.com/content.php?id=114541&path=AN986N.INF the default USB IDs] for *'''Pegasus I''' / AN986 (07a6:0986) and *'''Pegasus II''' / ADM8511 (07a6:8511)
==Links of Interest== * [https://www.solodrivers.com/en/Network-card/13/Farallon/995 ''Farallon'' drivers]
